class.rdfs:comment: A recipe. For dietary restrictions covered by the recipe, a few common restrictions are enumerated via [[suitableForDiet]]. The [[keywords]] property can also be used to add more detail.
class.rdfs:label: Recipe

schema:cookTime.rdfs:comment: The time it takes to actually cook the dish, in [ISO 8601 duration format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).
schema:cookTime.rdfs:label: cookTime

schema:cookingMethod.rdfs:comment: The method of cooking, such as Frying, Steaming, ...
schema:cookingMethod.rdfs:label: cookingMethod

schema:ingredients.rdfs:comment: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.
schema:ingredients.rdfs:label: ingredients

schema:nutrition.rdfs:comment: Nutrition information about the recipe or menu item.
schema:nutrition.rdfs:label: nutrition

schema:recipeCategory.rdfs:comment: The category of the recipeâ€”for example, appetizer, entree, etc.
schema:recipeCategory.rdfs:label: recipeCategory

schema:recipeCuisine.rdfs:comment: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).
schema:recipeCuisine.rdfs:label: recipeCuisine

schema:recipeIngredient.rdfs:comment: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic.
schema:recipeIngredient.rdfs:label: recipeIngredient

schema:recipeInstructions.rdfs:comment: A step in making the recipe, in the form of a single item (document, video, etc.) or an ordered list with HowToStep and/or HowToSection items.
schema:recipeInstructions.rdfs:label: recipeInstructions

schema:recipeYield.rdfs:comment: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, number of people served, number of servings, etc).
schema:recipeYield.rdfs:label: recipeYield

schema:suitableForDiet.rdfs:comment: Indicates a dietary restriction or guideline for which this recipe or menu item is suitable, e.g. diabetic, halal etc.
schema:suitableForDiet.rdfs:label: suitableForDiet
